text: Ronald J. Ortiz-Magro Jr. (born December 4, 1985) is an American television personality. He is best known as one of the eight main cast members in the MTV reality series Jersey Shore. He was born in The Bronx, New York City. In 2017, Ortiz-Magro appeared in the second season of the E! reality series Famously Single. In 2018, Ronnie Ortiz-Magro became part of the main cast in the MTV reality television series Jersey Shore: Family Vacation. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:Television personalities from New York City
title: Ronnie Ortiz-Magro
